posts.post_title: 1895  N300  Mayo's Cut Plug  25 SGC For Sale
posts.post_content: 1895 Mayo Cut Plug  N300---I have the following 25 Mayo's for sale---SGC Authentic Cartwright $175===SGC 10 Haddock(no Team) $200===SGc 10 Tucker $225===SGC 10 Griffin $190===SGC 20 Hallman $290===SGC 20 Ryan $190===SGC 20 Daly $220===SGC 20 Foutz $190===SGC 20 Long $210===SGC Joyce $210===SGC 30 Ganzel $220===SGC 30 Smith $300===SGC 30 Lowe $300===SGC 30 Cross $310===SGC 30 Glasscock(Louisville) $400===SGC 30 Corcoran $300===SGC 30 Lovett $310===SGC 40 Shindle $525===SGC 40 Kinslow(Pitt) $500===SGC 50 Nash $550===SGC 50 Bannon $425===SGC Authentic Duffy $530===SGC Authentic Hamilton $550===SGC 10 McCarthy $550===SGC 40 Robinson $1400---Scans are available--email me with any questions---thanks, Don====I did the Boston show this past weekend and sold 8 other commons and SGC 40 Russie--and a SGC 50 Duffy--my next show is the National--
